title: 安装一些新mod时经常发生这种事情，比如家具mod，魔法mod等
author: KomeijiC
txt_content:
具体如下---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad, have a hug! <3

Time: 14-8-18 上午11:43
Description: Exception in server tick loop
